title: Augusta County: John Quincy Adams Nadenbousch to Hester J. Nadenbousch, March 18, 1866
summary: Nadenbousch writes his wife to complain about his health and lack of news from home. He sends more instructions on farm preparations. He also reports plans to go to Lexington with the intention of possibly purchasing a hotel there.
keywords: Agriculture, Family, Home Front, Women, American Civil War
